js
const throttle = function(func, delay) {
  let timer = null;
  return function(...args) {
    // ä¸€å®šæ—¶é—´å†…ï¼Œåªèƒ½è§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡
    if (!timer) {
      timer = setTimeout(function() {
        func.apply(this, args);
        timer = null;
      }, delay);
    }
  }
}
// å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
function handle() {
  console.log(Math.random());
}
// ç›‘å¬äº‹ä»¶
window.addEventListener('resize', throttle(handle, 1000));
const throttle = function(func, delay) {
  let timer = null;
  return function(...args) {
    // ä¸€å®šæ—¶é—´å†…ï¼Œåªèƒ½è§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡
    if (!timer) {
      timer = setTimeout(function() {
        func.apply(this, args);
        timer = null;
      }, delay);
    }
  }
}
// å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
function handle() {
  console.log(Math.random());
}
// ç›‘å¬äº‹ä»¶
window.addEventListener('resize', throttle(handle, 1000));

é˜²æŠ– â€‹

æ”¹å˜äº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘æ—¶æœº

js
const debounce = function(func, delay) {
  let timer = null;
  return function(...args) {
    // ä¸€å®šæ—¶é—´å†…ï¼Œé‡å¤è§¦å‘åˆ™å–æ¶ˆï¼Œåªè§¦å‘æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡
    if (timer) clearTimeout(timer);
    timer = setTimeout(function() {
      func.apply(this, args);
      timer = null;
    }, delay);
  }
}
function handle() {
  console.log(Math.random());
}
window.addEventListener('resize', debounce(handle, 1000));
const debounce = function(func, delay) {
  let timer = null;
  return function(...args) {
    // ä¸€å®šæ—¶é—´å†…ï¼Œé‡å¤è§¦å‘åˆ™å–æ¶ˆï¼Œåªè§¦å‘æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡
    if (timer) clearTimeout(timer);
    timer = setTimeout(function() {
      func.apply(this, args);
      timer = null;
    }, delay);
  }
}
function handle() {
  console.log(Math.random());
}
window.addEventListener('resize', debounce(handle, 1000));
